SEARCH
Package org.example.model.entities

Class Pirate

java.lang.Object
org.example.model.entities.Pirate
public class Pirate extends Object
The Pirate class represents the player character in the game. The pirate has a certain number of lives and a backpack to carry items. The pirate can lose lives and if it runs out of lives, the game is over. The pirate can also carry items in its backpack up to a certain weight.
